long_description: With breathable uppers and well-cushioned midsoles for all-day comfort, the Keen Marshall Hiking Shoes for men provide a supportive platform for warm-weather hiking. Nylon mesh uppers with synthetic leather overlays give lightweight structure and support while allowing comfortable ventilation. EVA footbeds deliver ample cushioning and are removable to accommodate orthotics. High-rebound polyurethane midsoles supply shock absorption for all-day comfort. Supportive thermoplastic urethane shanks enhance torsional stability on uneven terrain. Keen Marshall Hiking Shoes have nonmarking rubber outsoles with 4mm multidirectional lugs for excellent all-around traction.
short_description: With breathable uppers and well-cushioned midsoles for all-day comfort, the Keen Marshall Hiking Shoes for men provide a supportive platform for warm-weather hiking.
